column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So we were in Chicago for five or six days and I haven't been in years. I love pizza. And I mean
column2: I LOVE pizza. All kinds of pizza. Thin crust
column9: pizza that may or may not have fallen on the ground. In my books
